title: Stjärnor utan svindel
description: A story about relationships between women and women, women and men, people and unfaithfulness. Sophie is living a successful life with her husband and their dogs. Life runs smoothly. Enters Kaja, a leftwing radical feminist and lesbian. She will make Sophie start questioning her life and ultimately make her change both herself and how she lives her life.
author: Louise Boije af Gennäs
